attributes.action: make guidelines on publication of photographs of people crying
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is no place in a parliamentary democracy with constitutional rights to privacy for such gross invasions - at funerals, in the emergency services and
in distress. The petitioner has serious concerns about how the media age is affecting the functions of hospitals and the courts. When people are in crisis, often confused and vulnerable, this kind of voyeurism to me just seems like sick, savage fun.

Please develop a mechanism for

a) photographs to be taken
b) and published

Can we as society not somehow address this problem for the benefit of ourselves and others who similarly may be affected ? Next it could be you.
